ComicInfo.Summary:
In order to stop HeNRI's super-collider, Julie must have the rest of the Beta Suit. When she infiltrates HeNRI's secret test facility, Julie finds what she's looking for. Question is, can she survive it? Find out in the latest issue of this radioactive hot series!
Ivy takes them by plane to her home to see if the suit can cure her child. Julie sees Anni in her dreams. Julie meet Lulu, Ivy's deaf child, and they hug but it does not cure her. Julie tells Ivy about Cain how he was cursed and wanted death from her it seems.
The incidents surrounding Cain are getting more press attention much to the annoyance of Dr Foster. Jack communicated wit the badly injured Hong who refuses to give up the gun research and Jack shows his evil side when he refuses pain medication until he complies.
Julie has an idea and strips off her top, the suit now down her front and legs, she figures if fear makes it attack that compassion might make it cure. She learns personal things about Lulu and hugs her, saying out-loud nice things. Within moments she responds to her mothers voice.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 14:41:00. [CVDB182530]
ComicInfo.Characters: Hong Liu, Ivy M. Raven, Julie Martin, Pamela Mitchell
